title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Description (1 point)

· The amino acid substitution changes the shape/structure/function of the protein.

Reasoning (1 point)

· The mutation decreases/eliminates gibberellin production.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Description (1 point)

· The amino acid substitution changes the shape/structure/function of the protein.

Reasoning (1 point)

· The mutation decreases/eliminates gibberellin production.

Student response earns one of the available points.

Reasoning (1 point)

· The mutation decreases/eliminates gibberellin production.

Student response earns two of the available points.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Prediction (1 point maximum)

· G ↔ A in the first position (of the codon)

· 5′-GCN-3′ ↔ 5′-ACN-3′

· 5′-NGC-3′ ↔ 5′-NGT-3′ in the template strand of DNA
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

· G ↔ A in the first position (of the codon)

· 5′-GCN-3′ ↔ 5′-ACN-3′

· 5′-NGC-3′ ↔ 5′-NGT-3′ in the template strand of DNA

Student response earns one of the available points.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Description (1 point)

· Enough active enzyme is produced from one wild-type/dominant allele.

· Enough gibberellin is produced in the presence of one wild-type/dominant allele
descriptions:
